scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('env.production', '.env.production')" && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: cd admin && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('env.production', '.env.production')" && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.run:all: start cmd /k "npm run start:backend" && start cmd /k "npm run dev:frontend" && start cmd /k "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:admin
scripts.dev-all: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd admin && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm start"
